Module kingdoms.kingdoms
Package kingdoms.kingdoms

Class Kingdom

  • java.lang.Object
    • kingdoms.kingdoms.Province
      • kingdoms.kingdoms.Duchy
        • kingdoms.kingdoms.Kingdom
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Empire
    public class Kingdom
extends Duchy

    Implements a kingdom - higher level of duchy @see Duchy. It has all the parameters of a duchy and additionaly a legitimacy of the kingdom

      Constructs kingdom with name, ruler, provinces, centralization and legitimacy

    • Constructor Detail

      • Kingdom

        public Kingdom​(java.lang.String name,
               Ruler ruler,
               java.util.List<Province> provinces,
               kingdoms.kingdoms.Centralization centralization,
               int legitimacy)
        Constructs kingdom with name, ruler, provinces, centralization and legitimacy
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the kingdom
        ruler - Ruler of the kingdom
        provinces - List of provinces held by the kingdom. Also accepts duchies
        centralization - Centralization of the kingdom (enum)
        legitimacy - Level of kingdom's legitimacy

      • setRuler

        public void setRuler​(Ruler ruler)
        Sets new ruler. Overrides setRuler() from Duchy because of different stability calculations
        Overrides:
        setRuler in class Duchy
        Parameters:
        ruler - New kingdom's ruler

      • updateStability

        public void updateStability()
        Update stability based on number of provinces, centralizaion, legitimacy, ruler's prestige and age. Overrides updateStability() from Duchy
        Overrides:
        updateStability in class Duchy
